name: Far As The Horizon
description:
A Sci-Fi game about surviving on different procedurally generated planets.

Your spaceship has crashed and you have to survive on an alien planet. Will you be able to get back home?

Found a bug? Report it here: https://discord.gg/rBeKSANvSW

Last Update:

1. Removed testing actors from the map;

2. Increased the ammout of Research objects;

3.Smaller changes;

It`s better to create a new save. But if you want to transfer them move files from WindowsNoEditor\FAH\Saved\SaveGames to the new version.
